sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './App.css' const About = () => { return(

About

'Angels among us' is a simple tool for people looking for ways to share some of their income with people who are in dire economic straits because of the COVID-19 pandemic.

{/*
*/}

Many of these people are out of a job due to cutbacks/downsizing, low patronage or simply being unable to venture out to do work while they have dependents.


What's this website?

'Angels among us' is a simple database of people who need help, randomly delivered to you ten at a time. You can then copy their account details and make a contribution to their well-being.


None of your payments pass through me in any form. You are helping these distressed people directly, without my having to play a middleman's role.

) } export default About
